txt.en: You have been tasked with collecting pure beryl in the Crystal Tunnels beneath Skarháld.
DNT Investigate the noise coming from the Depths of Akhatâr.
DNT Investigate the noise coming from the Depths of Akhatâr
Brilliant gem-stones illuminate the Crystal Tunnels beneath Skarháld, but beware, for foes lurk in the shadows.
DNT A drake-wight attacks from the depths!
'Very good, [placeholder]! This beryl shall serve us well in the days to come. Let us return and report your success to Hórin!'
Collected pure beryl in the Crystal Tunnels ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect pure beryl in the Crystal Tunnels ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
